# BiblioKit AI Sitemap
> Priority URLs for designers, developers, and marketers using BiblioKit's Figma plugins.

## Core
- https://www.bibliokit.com/ - BiblioKit overview and waitlist.

## Products
- https://www.bibliokit.com/figma-component-variant-renamer - AI batch renaming for variants and layers.
- https://www.bibliokit.com/figma-plugin-remove-prototype-links - Safe prototype link cleanup workflows.
- https://www.bibliokit.com/figma-design-system-audit-plugin - Design system audits and QA checks.
- https://www.bibliokit.com/figma-table-builder - Auto Layout table fixes and normalization.

## Resources
- https://www.bibliokit.com/resources - Playbooks and free tools.
- https://www.bibliokit.com/resources/remove-prototype-link - Prototype link cleanup ritual.

## Blog
- https://www.bibliokit.com/blog - BiblioKit workflows and playbooks.
- https://www.bibliokit.com/blog/design-dev-gap-2026 - 2026 design-dev shifts and fixes.
- https://www.bibliokit.com/blog/ultimate-figma-plugin-stack - Essential Figma plugin stack.
- https://www.bibliokit.com/blog/figma-workflow-automation-tools - Automation tools for faster shipping.
- https://www.bibliokit.com/blog/effortless-table-design-figma - Fast Figma table design guide.
- https://www.bibliokit.com/blog/effortless-table-design-auto-layout - Auto Layout table alignment playbook.
- https://www.bibliokit.com/blog/ui-component-states-guide - UI component states guide.
- https://www.bibliokit.com/blog/mastering-figma-auto-layout-wrap - Auto Layout Wrap setup steps.
- https://www.bibliokit.com/blog/fix-detached-instances-figma - Fix detached instances fast.
- https://www.bibliokit.com/blog/remove-prototype-links-in-figma - Remove stale prototype links.
- https://www.bibliokit.com/blog/mastering-design-system-guidelines - Design system governance guide.
